notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
Write a set consisting of four small hand tools that might be in a toolbox and label it with a capital <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>T</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">T</annotation></semantics></math>.
detailedSolution:
One possible solution: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>T</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>wrench, screwdriver, hammer, plyers</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">T = \{ {\text{wrench, screwdriver, hammer, plyers}}\}</annotation></semantics></math>.
